Colossians__01.15__The firstborn: That is, first begotten; as the Evangelist declares, the only begotten of his Fatherhence, St. Chrisostom explains firstborn, not first created, as he was not created at all, but born of his Father before all ages; that is, coeval with the Father and with the Holy Ghost.
Colossians__01.24__Wanting: There is no want in the sufferings of Christ in himself as headbut many sufferings are still wanting, or are still to come, in his body the church, and his members the faithful.
